title: A sermon preached before his Maiestie at White-Hall, on the 24. of March last being Easter day, and being also the day of the beginning of His Maiesties most gracious reigne. By the Bishop of Elie His Maiesties almoner.
author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.
publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,
notes: The Bishop of Elie = Lancelot Andrewes.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
